questions.questionTitle: How most likely is the woman traveling?
What does the man say about Trinity Way?
anwers: It is close to the hotel.

script:
� Hello, Milo? I'm having problems finding the conference center. I passed the Star Hotel but couldn't find Denman Street.
� Okay. Denman Street is closed for construction, so you'll need to double back and take Trinity Way instead. Slow down when you see the gas station and take a right there.
� But I can't see Trinity Way on the GPS. Are you sure this is right?
� Yes, it's a new street so it might not show up yet.
